Title: Prohibits the permanent or temporary housing of migrant populations in schoolhouses or on school grounds in districts outside of N.Y. city
Summary: Prohibits the permanent or temporary housing of migrant populations in schoolhouses or on school grounds in districts outside of a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the permanent or temporary housing of migrant populations in schoolhouses or on school grounds in districts outside of a city with a population of one million or more
